name: Breaking Swipe
description: You swing your tail wildly around you. All creatures within 5ft must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 1d10 + MOVE dragon damage on a fail, and half as much on a success. Creatures that fail the saving throw also have disadvantage on all of their attacks until the end of their next turn.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
